title: Upgrade Helm Release
description: Upgrade an existing Helm release named ||my-app|| in namespace ||pluto|| by setting the value ||replicaCount=3|| using the ||--set|| flag.

steps: 1. Upgrade Helm release with new values:

validations.command: kubectl get deployment my-app -n pluto -o jsonpath='{.spec.replicas}'
validations.description: Deployment should have 3 replicas after upgrade
